general: Dear Cancer, the themes of commitment and personal growth reveal themselves today. The Moon in Gemini and the Sun in Aquarius urge you to reflect on your routines and thought patterns. Although this may require some effort, the health of your relationships will depend on your ability to evolve. If you feel secure in your partnerships, whether romantic or professional, trust: you are on the right path. The internal changes you initiate today will be the foundation for a fulfilling future.
love: Dare to express your feelings, communication is key.
work: Be open to new ideas, they could transform your work.
health: Take the time to reconnect with yourself today.
teaser: Evolve and strengthen your bonds today.
